name: Hadron Analytics
tag_list: patent-landscape-report, patent-portfolio-management, patent-search, patent-commercialization, prior-art-search, novelty-search
overview: Hadron Analytics is a global intellectual property (IP) consulting and technology research services company based out of US and India. We provide services in the form of patent landscape report, patent portfolio management, patent searches, patent due-diligence, business research and market research. Our clients are fortune 50 and fortune 500 companies across the globe. We at Hadron combine science with technology to make lives a little easier. Our analysis techniques and visualization tools are used by CEOs, patent attorneys, R&D department, Intellectual Property department, Business Intelligence (BI) groups to make effective business decisions. We focus on customized set of service offerings and have proven experience in working with counsel in several areas of life sciences and technology.
